item.title: Find out Bulk Email ID Reputations Risk using R
item.description: If you are working in Info Sec / Cyber Security, One of the things that might be part of your day job is to filter email to remove spams / phishing emails. While this could be done at several levels and ways, monitoring the email id (like abc@xyz.com) and validating its reputation to see if it seems risky / suspicious or authentic and then allowing them to reach the user inbox - is one of the solid ways (while itâ€™s also error-prone with False Positives).
